##Wrangling the genetics data

#1

```{r}
NewTable <-
  NCI60 %>%
  gather(key = cellLine, value = Expression, -Probe)
```

```{r}
TheData <-
  NewTable %>%
  group_by(Probe, cellLine) %>%
  summarise(Expression = mean(Expression)) %>%
  ungroup()
```

```{r}
CoolioTable <- 
  NewTable %>%
  group_by(Probe) %>% 
  summarise(Spread = sd(Expression))
```

```{r}
CoolioTable2 <- 
  TheData %>%
  group_by(Probe) %>%
  filter(sd(Expression) > 4)
```

```{r}
WideFormat <-
  CoolioTable2 %>%
  spread(key = Probe, value = Expression)
row.names(WideFormat) <- WideFormat$cellLine

Distances <- dist(WideFormat %>% select(-cellLine))

Dendrogram2 <- hclust(Distances)
ddata2 <- dendro_data(Dendrogram2)
ggdendrogram(Dendrogram2, rotate = TRUE) +geom_text(data = ddata$labels,aes(x = x, y = y, label = label), vjust = 0)
```
